title: LoL Client wont open past Launch Screen
body:
So basically I open the LoL launcher through the desktop and it wont go on to the next screen (password screen) 95% of the time. This is, as you can imagine, very frustrating as it can often take more than 10 minutes just to get to the password screen. Is anyone else having this problem or anyone had this problem and knows a fix? 

In windows 7 task manager it says that all 3 programs are open yet as you can see down the bottom there is no LoL icon open as you can see here http://prntscr.com/6njonm. 

Tried and failed solutions :
-Run as administrator
-Repaired client
-Fully un-installed and re-installed league.

Any and all help is appreciated.
Chilly.

replies.body: Do you have any firewalls/anti-virus installed and running? Try disabling those. Even though this isn't a connection issue, they could still be blocking the executable.
Yeah that still doesn't fix it ;-;

So, you get to the point where you click 'Launch' and then the next screen doesn't appear. And you're on Windows.

Go to your Internet Settings and makes sure there's nothing outrageous that's preventing an online executable from running. It should be obvious.

Try disabling UAC. This can be accessed from the Control Panel.

Sync your internal clock to an internet source.

And lastly, if none of the above worked, [change your DNS](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues#wq5).

If all that fails, triple check that nothing is blocking the application or otherwise causing it not to execute on your computer (overzealous download manager perhaps) and then try looking over [this](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes).

If none of that works, then you're probably out of luck, aside from reinstalling Windows again. You can make a support ticket about it, but they'll more or less just ask for logs and rephrase the support page itself.

Best of luck.
Tried all that... Still not happening
